features: The cute silicone straw cover caps Set comes 8 pieces of the differnet cute sea animals. Different straw covers help to distinguish different people's straws. Suitable for straws with an outer diameter of 10 mm 0.4inch. The animal reusable straw topper covers compatible with Stanley 30&40 oz tumbler straw. Note: Straws cups and straws are not included.

The Anti-dust Straw Caps Reusable Straw Topper has a strip that can be fixed on the straw, Straw Tip Covers can always hung on the side of the straw after opening the cover, it will not be lost. Usage of the Silicone Straw Toppers :dust proof, splash proof, debris proof,cup's decor .

Straw toppers for stanley cup are made of food grade material silicone. All the straw toppers for stanley cups are soft and flexible well. The Silicone stanley straw covers are BPA free, soft, flexible, safe and healthy, reusable, environmentally , Sturdy, for both hand washable and dishwasher.

The straw caps for stanley cups can seal your straw, so that stanley cup straw topper can prevent dust when not drinking, or prevent drinks from spilling during moving. Easy to Clean, The reusable straw caps and flexible which can be both cleaned by hand or in the dishwasher, natural drying.

The cute Silicone Animal Straw Cover Caps are good gift for friend or family , this mini cup Stanley cup straw cover looks very cute, easy to put on and take off when using.Tight enough for helping compatible with Stanley Cups 40 oz & 30 oz drinking straws, also suitable for other straws with an external diameter of 8-10 mm.

The Silicone Straw Covers set includes 8pieces of stanley straw toppers. The stanley straw cover with the following cute design : Octopus；Turtle ；Scallop；Dolphin ; Whale ; Seal ; Starfish ；Sea lion. Great stanley cup accessories for gift choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and well made
reviews.reviewText: Cute and detailed designs, fit 10mm glass or reusable plastic straws for 40 oz Stanley well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are nice straw toppers for a good price ($9.99) for the quantity (8). My favorite is the dolphin which is actually the only reason I chose this set, lol. These fit great on wide straws that you typically purchase in addition to the tumbler (or whatever cup you have), however, these are a bit to loose on the regular straws that typically come with tumblers. They will still sit on it if it’s in your cup and will protect your straw, they just aren’t form fitting so, for example, if your cup gets knocked over, these toppers will fall off the straw.Overall, other than that, these are great toppers and very cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: super cute, fit my 30oz stanley straw perfect! quality is as expected (good). the shark is so cute 😭 I love them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Arrived fast and better quality than I was expecting!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy easy to identify your drink tumbler
reviews.reviewText: These straw toppers are a creative way to identify your drink tumbler from others! If your coworkers, friends or family all use tumblers that look a lot like yours, these straw toppers are a fun way to make yours stand out from the crowd. My personal favorites are the turtle, seal and shark.Fit is a little loose on most straws, but they still stay on without falling off. Get this assortment and share a few with your family and friends!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and easy to use straw caps.
reviews.reviewText: Yes, I'm freaked out that my straws sitting in a cup on my kitchen counter could be homes for wayward spiders. Imagine putting a straw in your drink and sucking up a sleeping spider. Yes, I got these to cap the straws while stored and while I use them in my travel mugs and soda Beast cups. Super soft squishy sea creatures are cute. They slip over the end of a rubber tipped straw and metal straws easily. They sit tight capped over the end of the straw, allowing no wiggle room. When I leave my cup at the office at night, I cap it and am assured the straw is free and clear to use the next day! It does not prevent your soda from going flat over night. The cup lids are too wide to hold straws tight. This is just a cute great way to keep the end of your straw clean, and adorable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got these for my sisters and I's stanleys and they work gret and are super cute! Def recommend! Work just as expected and plenty to go around and keep to use for more stanelys you buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great idea!
reviews.reviewText: We have a cat who likes to rub up against *everything*, and God knows what she does when we're asleep, so these little caps are *perfect* for our family! Our tumblers are not Stanley, but another brand, a 32oz and a 40oz - these caps fit the straws perfectly. Our son has a 24oz cup, and while the cap is a little looser, it's still snug enough to stay on. These caps are a great idea - both cute and functional!
